thread.title: Mumbai welcomes first 400kV GIS substation by Godrej, enhancing city's energy capacity by 1500MVA, ET EnergyWorld
thread.title_full: Mumbai welcomes first 400kV GIS substation by Godrej, enhancing city's energy capacity by 1500MVA, ET EnergyWorld

author: www.ETEnergyworld.com
title: Mumbai welcomes first 400kV GIS substation by Godrej, enhancing city's energy capacity by 1500MVA, ET EnergyWorld
text: New Delhi: In a significant push towards bolstering India's energy infrastructure, Godrej Electricals & Electronics, a unit of Godrej & Boyce, announced the completion of projects ranging from 132kV to 765kV, with its current order bank exceeding â‚¹1700 crore in the substation segment.The company has commissioned eight substations in the fiscal year 2024, including a landmark 400kV GIS vertical substation in Mumbai, enhancing the city's energy capacity by 1500MVA.Raghavendra Mirji, Executive Vice President & Business Head at Godrej Electricals & Electronics, highlighted the project's impact, stating, \"With a commitment to reliability and sustainability, our strides in the substation sector signify not just a business success but a vital contribution to India's energy resilience. As we install Mumbai's first 400kV GIS Substation, adding 1500 MVA capacity for the city, we are not merely building substations; we are laying the foundation for a future where energy is both abundant and green.\"Godrej Electricals & Electronics is partnering with private sector players to undertake diverse substation and renewable energy projects across India, aiming to meet the growing demand for reliable and sustainable power in metro cities, challenging terrains of North East states, Jammu, and key regional hubs like Khavda in Gujarat.
